cyclone.name: LAURA
cyclone.current_location: about 60 miles (100 km) south of Camagüey, Cuba
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest along the southern coast of Cuba, forecast to enter the Gulf of Mexico then curve northwest toward the Texas-Louisiana Gulf Coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the Texas–Louisiana border on the U.S. Gulf Coast

weather_observation.watch_coast: N/A – no watches include Puerto Rico at this time
weather_observation.warning_coast: N/A – no warnings include Puerto Rico at this time
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Primary impacts expected along Cuba, then the central and northwest Gulf Coast of the United States (Texas–Louisiana)
weather_observation.wind: No strong winds expected at San Juan, PR during this event
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected at San Juan, PR
weather_observation.rainfall: No heavy rainfall expected at San Juan, PR
